bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Testing Metal-Enclosed Switchgear Rated up to 38 kV for Internal Arcing Faults Corrigendum 1
IEEE Guide for Testing Metal-Enclosed Switchgear Rated up to 38 kV for Internal Arcing Faults Corrigendum 1
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Std C37.20.7-2007/Cor 1-2010 (Corrigendum to IEEE Std C37.20.7-2007)

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This corrigendum corrects technical errors found in IEEE Std C37.20.7-2007 during use in laboratories concerning current values and arc initiation in low-voltage (LV) testing and supply frequency for all equipment.
